name: Intern Simulator
description:
You just received the opportunity of a lifetime interning at [NAME REDACTED]! It is time to work your hardest to climb the corporate ladder to hopefully make the world a better place!

CONTROLS:

Move - WASD or Arrow Keys

Look - Mouse

Interact - Left Mouse Button

Pause - Escape

CREDITS:

Art - Jake Nguyen
Programming - Ali Kedwaii, Robert Guan
Narrative - Ashley Poprik
Music - Ali Kedwaii
